headline: Oscar Mayer Seeks New Class of Hotdoggers to Drive the Beloved Wienermobile into Its 90th Year
summary: CHICAGO & PITTSBURGH, December 08, 2025--Today, Oscar Mayer announces that applications are open for its next class of Hotdoggers, inviting recent college graduates to apply for a one-year, full-time adventure behind the wheel of the iconic Wienermobile. Open through January 31, the relished position offers fans the opportunity to become official spokespeople of the brand while living out its mission of sparking smiles across the country.

content.title: Oscar Mayer Seeks New Class of Hotdoggers to Drive the Beloved Wienermobile into Its 90th Year
content.summary: CHICAGO & PITTSBURGH, December 08, 2025--Today, Oscar Mayer announces that applications are open for its next class of Hotdoggers, inviting recent college graduates to apply for a one-year, full-time adventure behind the wheel of the iconic Wienermobile. Open through January 31, the relished position offers fans the opportunity to become official spokespeople of the brand while living out its mission of sparking smiles across the country.

thumbnail.caption: Now through January 31, Oscar Mayer invites fans to apply for a one-year, full-time, paid gig behind the wheel of the iconic Wienermobile.
